00042 #ifndef AMINO_TIME_H
00043 #define AMINO_TIME_H
00044 
00049 #include <errno.h>
00051 static inline struct timespec
00052 aa_tm_make( time_t sec, long nsec ) {
00053     struct timespec t;
00054     t.tv_sec = sec;
00055     t.tv_nsec = nsec;
00056     return t;
00057 }
00058 
00061 static inline struct timespec
00062 aa_tm_make_norm( time_t sec, long nsec ) {
00063     long nsp = aa_lmodulo( nsec, AA_IBILLION );
00064     return aa_tm_make( sec + (nsec - nsp)/AA_IBILLION, nsp );
00065 }
00066 
00068 static inline struct timespec
00069 aa_tm_add( struct timespec t1, struct timespec t0 ) {
00070     return aa_tm_make_norm( t1.tv_sec + t0.tv_sec,
00071                             t1.tv_nsec + t0.tv_nsec );
00072 }
00073 
00075 static inline struct timespec
00076 aa_tm_sub( const struct timespec a, const struct timespec b ) {
00077     return aa_tm_make_norm( a.tv_sec - b.tv_sec,
00078                             a.tv_nsec - b.tv_nsec );
00079 }
00080 
00082 static inline struct timespec
00083 aa_tm_now() {
00084     struct timespec t;
00085     clock_gettime( CLOCK_REALTIME, &t );
00086     return t;
00087 }
00088 
00090 static inline struct timespec
00091 aa_tm_future( const struct timespec reltime ) {
00092     return aa_tm_add( reltime, aa_tm_now() );
00093 }
00094 
00096 static inline long
00097 aa_tm_cmp( const struct timespec t1, const struct timespec t2 ) {
00098     return ( t1.tv_sec != t2.tv_sec ) ?
00099         (t1.tv_sec - t2.tv_sec) :
00100         (t1.tv_nsec - t2.tv_nsec);
00101 }
00102 
00104 static inline struct timespec
00105 aa_tm_min( const struct timespec t1, const struct timespec t2 ) {
00106     return (aa_tm_cmp(t1,t2)<0) ? t1 : t2;
00107 }
00108 
00110 static inline struct timespec
00111 aa_tm_max( const struct timespec t1, const struct timespec t2 ) {
00112     return (aa_tm_cmp(t1,t2)>0) ? t1 : t2;
00113 }
00114 
00116 static inline int
00117 aa_tm_isafter( const struct timespec abstime ) {
00118     return aa_tm_cmp(aa_tm_now(), abstime) > 0;
00119 }
00120 
00122 static inline int64_t
00123 aa_tm_timespec2usec( const struct timespec t ) {
00124     return t.tv_sec*1000000 + t.tv_nsec/1000;
00125 }
00126 
00128 static inline double
00129 aa_tm_timespec2sec( const struct timespec t ) {
00130     return (double)t.tv_sec + (double)t.tv_nsec/1e9;
00131 }
00132 
00134 static inline struct timespec
00135 aa_tm_sec2timespec( double t ) {
00136     time_t sec = (time_t) t;
00137     long nsec = (long) ((t-(double)sec)*AA_IBILLION);
00138     return aa_tm_make_norm( sec, nsec );
00139 }
00140 
00142 static inline int
00143 aa_tm_relsleep( struct timespec t ) {
00144     struct timespec rem;
00145     int r;
00146     do {
00147         r = nanosleep( &t, &rem );
00148         assert( 0 == r || EINTR == errno );
00149         t.tv_sec = rem.tv_sec;
00150         t.tv_nsec = rem.tv_nsec;
00151     } while( 0 != r ) ;
00152     return 0;
00153 }

00157 #define AA_FEATURE_RDTSC
00158 AA_API uint64_t aa_rdtsc(void);
